title: Vehicular Pursuit Policy (Santa Cruz Police Department)

communications.subject: California Public Records Act Request: Vehicular Pursuit Policy (Santa Cruz Police Department)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

All current policies maintained by the department regarding vehicle pursuits (also known as: car chase, vehicular response policy, vehicular pursuit procedure, fleet crashes).

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Sydnee Coggins-Prioleau

communications.subject: San Francisco Police Public Records Request :: P121026-072323
communications.communication:
Dear Sydnee Coggins-Prioleau: 
 
Thank you for your interest in public records of the San Francisco Police Department ("SFPD"). 
 
The San Francisco Police Department ("SFPD") received your request, dated July 23, 2023 and given the reference number P121026-072323 for tracking purposes. 
 
Record(s) Requested: To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

All current policies maintained by the department regarding vehicle pursuits (also known as: car chase, vehicular response policy, vehicular pursuit procedure, fleet crashes).

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Sydnee Coggins-Prioleau

Upload documents directly: https://accounts.muckrock.com/accounts/login/?next=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.muckrock.com%2Faccounts%2Flogin%2F%3Fnext%3D%252Faccounts%252Fagency_login%252Fsan-francisco-police-department-367%252Fvehicular-pursuit-policy-san-francisco-police-department-149628%252F%253Femail%253Dsanfranciscopd%252540mycusthelp.net&url_auth_token=AAAIhg5Bs8g3eL6eHSy_S-rHsGw%3A1qNomM%3AnCAtL2r8SjfPjOYasNc-pBW6MJ7TKB_6decCdXkXJZQ 
 
Your request is being forwarded to the appropriate department(s) for processing and you will be notified once the request is complete. 
 
You can monitor request progress at the link below.  Thank you for using the San Francisco Public Records Center. 
 
 
San Francisco Police Department

communications.subject: Your San Bernardino County public records request #23-5085 has been opened.
communications.communication:
San Bernardino County ************************************************************************ Your record request #23-5085 has been submitted successfully. Dear Requester: San Bernardino County is in receipt of your Public Records Act request. Pursuant to Government Code section 7922.535(a), the County anticipates providing you an initial response to your request within 10 days. Should you have any questions, or if you would like to provide further information or clarification regarding your request, please reply to this email. ************************************************************************ Reply to this email or sign in to contact San Bernardino County.

Change your email settings | Visit our help center

communications.subject: Public Information Act Request :: P005741-072423
communications.communication:
Dear Sydnee Coggins-Prioleau: 
Thank you for your interest in public records of San Angelo Police Department. Your request has been received and is being processed in accordance with Chapter 552 of Texas Government Code, the Public Information Act. Your request was received in this office on 7/24/2023 and given the reference number P005741-072423 for tracking purposes. Records Requested: To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

All current policies maintained by the department regarding vehicle pursuits (also known as: car chase, vehicular response policy, vehicular pursuit procedure, fleet crashes).

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Sydnee Coggins-Prioleau

Upload documents directly: https://accounts.muckrock.com/accounts/login/?next=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.muckrock.com%2Faccounts%2Flogin%2F%3Fnext%3D%252Faccounts%252Fagency_login%252Fsan-angelo-police-department-9622%252Fvehicular-pursuit-policy-san-angelo-police-department-149680%252F%253F&url_auth_token=AAAhg6vAhpyMvHL9rdY_FYdgaRk%3A1qNofM%3AydVBI5Vr6sRAOfS8XqeKVC2QjQrLgttIJ5T62vdd-WM 
Your request will be forwarded to the relevant San Angelo Police department(s) to locate the information you seek and to determine the volume and any costs associated with satisfying your request. You will be contacted about the availability and/or provided with copies of the records in question. PLEASE NOTE: The Chapter 552 of Texas Government Code, the Public Information Act does not require a governmental body to create new information, to do legal research, or to answer questions.You can monitor the progress of your request at the link below and you'll receive an email when your request has been completed. 
 
To monitor the progress or update this request please log into the COSA Public Information Portal (https://u8387795.ct.sendgrid.net/ls/click?upn=nZGH0ylxadMp5hTpNkeAFsHDolzSSfbYSMelyZ0QQ2JxguCKch-2BlowKxJHFbRj-2Fic4Sda5-2Bp0pQGHgkOGI5RHbv6PbZcKzh2mdAbkt7k0g4-3Ds4FL_ZzDwXv9omZcKsOAWx9VKXzeqQrEWohPomcLMfe0O9aWLKZFFFBaUCKl5OjKj-2Bgw12ajPVW1qIxtmQNGs5FSuNMcO9rjPPVxFSVkdGFMu0Cq0y6kd-2FiDcmBXfYeT2BAMPkgxJ-2FG4rPhLhxTPs3FJP9oOuZb9rAKyiFqan-2FCHtnCAzxDly7QgT-2FfjGJG8C0ICALkz-2FT3wpKsagBpLLloJdz6rnGORV3vTF5kiD2rH27VFugrxrNl9w-2FMBbbKhPPl9OBYEX3Dl77Cx5vHuV1ZY1dvKIhR0EfBaHTB-2BLwOZWQxQ13Ftjtzz0Fw8HBl74jP7cItOsspPZRFRYJVf7K0kHB0hR5mQKBr5eCf6jYJJwMXevXEvUC8SRhE9wVH2K1sjm7Lh6VNxGA9X-2FOK26EwdqPw-3D-3D)

communications.subject: Your Login Information - DC Government FOIA Portal
communications.communication:
This is an automated message from the DC Government FOIA system. 
Dear Sydnee Coggins-Prioleau, 

Thank for you registering to the District of Columbia Government's Freedom of Information Act Public Access Wesite! You are now able to see your request history and download records. 
A temporary password has been issued and sent to the email address provided. Please check your email for this temporary password and return to https://foia-dc.gov/palMain.aspx to login. Kindly change the temporary password provided by us. 

Regards, 
DC Government FOIA Portal 
Having technical difficulties? Email foia.support@dc.gov or call 202-478-5838 (mailto:foia.support@dc.gov)

communications.subject: Your Password Information - DC Government FOIA Portal
communications.communication:

Once you login, please change your password to protect your account details. Password: 83RHjy*!

DC Government FOIA Portal

communications.subject: Request Acknowledgement by DC Government FOIA Portal
communications.communication:
This is an automated message from the DC Government FOIA system. 
Dear Sydnee Coggins-Prioleau, 
Request Number 2023-FOIA-07748 has been assigned to the request you submitted. 
In all future correspondence regarding this request, please reference request number 2023-FOIA-07748. To check for status, please log in  https://foia-dc.gov/palMain.aspx and go to Request Status. 
For any questions regarding your request, please contact the FOIA office directly. Find the list of agency Open Governement and FOIA contact information by visiting FOIA Contact Information. For ease of reference, we ask that you have your FOIA Request Number available when you contact the FOIA office. (https://dc.gov/node/818962) 
Regards,DC Government FOIA Portal 
Having technical difficulties? Email or call 202-478-5973 (mailto:foia.support@dc.gov) foia.support@dc.gov
